title.rendered: Financial Commission Launches New Value-Added Service Providing Multi-Asset Liquidity with TradeTech Alpha

content.rendered:
October 1st, 2018, The Financial Commission, a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets, today announces the launch of a new “value-added” service for its broker members, providing multi-asset liquidity and pricing from TradeTech Alpha.

Following the recent launch of “Value-Added” Services by the Financial Commission, TradeTech Alpha has joined the new program to provide institutional trading services to Financial Commission’s broker members.

 

TradeTech Alpha

TradeTech Alpha, a wholly owned subsidiary of Playtech (LSE:PTEC) provides a full range of liquidity and execution solutions. Their efforts are centered on the continual development of leading technology, custom liquidity solutions and long-term relationships with partners. Among the services available from Trade Tech Alpha are liquidity solutions for FX, Equities, Equity CFDs and crypto currencies.

Benefits for Brokers

The Financial Commission is offering its Category A members special access to liquidity packages for FX and Equities or cryptocurrencies provided by TradeTech Alpha. Financial Commission Category A broker members can receive liquidity solutions for FX, Equities, Equity CFDs and crypto currencies with no monthly exchange data subscription fees*.

To get more information on TradeTech Alpha’s liquidity packages or to sign-up, please reach out to us at info@financialcommission.org.

*Category A members will have their subscription fees waived for the first year of using TradeTech Alpha pricing and liquidity services where applicable. The fee waiver is subject only to one package with FX and Equities or cryptocurrency products. All other fees and minimum commission volumes are the responsibility of the broker. Participation in this special offer is subject to the member being in good standing with the Commission per the Commission’s Rules and Guidelines. A member’s participation in this offer may be cancelled if the broker ceases to be a member of the Financial Commission. In such cases, the broker will be responsible for all subscription fees due to TradeTech Alpha going forward.
